companionAccepted: Sure why not?.$h#$b#Where we are going today?$h
companionAccepted_Spouse: Oh, of course I will @!$h#$b#I love spending time together with you baby.$h
companionRejected: I'm sorry but I have some errands to do today @ . Have fun though.
companionRejectedNight: It's late and I'm kind of sleepy hehe.#$b#Sorr @.$s
companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Sorry baby, Let's go out tomorrow instead.$s#$b#Let's just cuddle tonigh can we?$l
companionDismiss: That was a fun adventure! Thanks for the time @.$h
companionDismiss_Spouse: So soon baby? Oh well, I understand. See you later at home @.
companionDismissAuto: It's getting kind of late @. I'm sorry but I need to go home now.#$b#Bye and goodluck!$h
companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Hey baby I'll head on home first okay? See you at home!
companionRecruited: Where are we going today, @?$h#$b#We aren't going to any scary places, are we?.$s
companionRecruited_Spouse: I can't wait to go out with you baby!$h#What do you want to do today?$6
nomedkits: I don't have much mana at the moment to heal you. Let me recharge.
heal: Here @! I think I still have some magic to spare for healing you.
companion_Beach: OH MY YOBA! It's been so long since I've been in the beach!$h
companion_Beach~1: Woah! Look at the beautiful ocean!$h#$b#It's been so long.
companion_Beach~2: Can we stay here for a while, I want to enjoy the sand and sea.$h
companion_Farm: Woah! Your farm looks pretty @. Great job!$h
companion_Farm_Spouse: Our farm looks amazing baby.$l#$b#I am so proud of you!!!$h
companion_Forest: I can see a wizard tower from here! That looks cool.#$b#I wonder if the wizard there knows my parents?
companion_Forest~1: It has been so long since I saw a forest from our world.#$b#Umuwi has a unique design to it's flora, but I do miss this view.$h
companionOnceEnter_Mine: Wait, we're going to the mines? Oh no.$s
companion_Mine: We're in the mines!$h#$b# It's good that I remembered to bring my war hammer!$h
companion_Mountain: %Bianka seems to be distracted at the animals that passed by.
companion_Mountain~1: Who is that man over there that camps in the mountains?#$b#He seems like an interesting person.
companion_Town: This town is so cute!$h#$b#I've been to a lot of towns with my mom before but this is just so cute I don't know why.
companion_Town_spring: The spring flowers add up to the town's cuteness! I love it!$h
companion_Town_Night: Hmm.. The town seems so empty at night doesn't it?#$b#I feel something strange at the graveyard as well.
companion_Town_fall: It's the fall season! I sure do love wearing outfits for this season!$h#$b#I sure do wish there is a mall in this place, Oh how I miss those.$s
companion_Town_Rainy: Good thing I brought my umbrella.#$b#Here get under here and let's stroll around the rain drenched town.$h
companion_Summit: Hey! I've never been in the summit before!$h#$b#Woah look at that view!$h
companion_Summit~1: It's amazing! Umuwi didn't have high mountains to have a view like this.#$b#Well atleast safe ones that is.
companion_Custom_BlueMoonVineyard: Wine? OHHH MY I MISSED OUR WORLD'S WINE!$h#$b#Come let's go buy some! $h
companion_Railroad: Hey the rail road! I sure do wish I can travel again when I have the time.
companion_Desert: I should've bought a desert themed outfit! You should've told meee!$s#$b#Oh well, I guess it's nice enough you bought me to new places so it's fine.$h
companion_Custom_LASV_Umuwi: The town of Umuwi has been like a second home to my brother and I.#$b#I do miss our home at Ruby Island as well but living here has opened me to independence to I'm kind of happy.$h
companion_Custom_LASV_Umuwi~1: I really like talking to Oddi and Laarni, They share very interesting stories!$h#$b#I especialy like the time when they told me about the other shadowfolk towns in this world.
companionSuggest: Hey @, I'm planning to stroll around anywhere. Wanna join?#$q -1 -1#Hey @, Wanna join me stroll around?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure! Let's go stroll around.#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
companionSuggest_Yes: Oh really! Yey! Well let's go! I want to see places!$h
companionSuggest_No: Awww, I understand. Well see you when I see you!$h
companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: This village looks pretty! Beautiful even!$h#$b#I can see a bunch of waterfalls all around, it's really magical.$h
